title: Rads Error on Patcher
body: Trying to download patch but I keep getting rads error. I've uninstalled and reinstalled 2 times and get the same thing, I've also ran as admin..

replies.body: same need help things in youtube don't work (crying)

This error usually comes up when something is blocking your game files from being scanned, so it can't locate or write new updates.  As a first step, try using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for a fix.  This should restore access!
